grahampaige.comment:
yes. Is there anything else? If not, then if we're through with new business, I would like to go ahead now into closed session. We do have three items on closed session.
Mr. Page moves that the board go into a closed meeting as authorized by the Virginia Freedom of Information Act section 2.23711a of the code of Virginia under subsection 1, for the discussion selection of search firm for the superintendent's position,
and also for discussing the acquisition of real property for public purpose where publicity thereof would adversely affect the bargaining position of the locality involving the location acquisition and disposition of publicly held property situated adjacent to Red Hill Elementary School
in North Garden District of Albemarle County, Va., tax map parcel number 11000000000450000; and secondly, the discussion consideration or interviews of prospective candidates for employment and assignment of chairmen. Vice Chair Carlson seconds.
I just moved that the Board move into closed session based on the three categories mentioned on our agenda. Any other discussion from the motion? Second?
All right, hearing none, Mrs. Johnson could please call roll? All those who are voting for us to go into closed session could say yes and all others can say no. So first Mr. Oberg? Yes. Dr. Acuff? Yes. Ms. Lee? Yes. Ms. Colson? Yes. Ms. DelCaro? Yes. Miss Alcaro? Yes. Ms. Osborne? Yes. Ms. Acuff again? No.
And finally, Chairman Paige. Yes. Motion passes eight-to-one, motion carried, and then  I'll close the open meeting at this point. The time is 8:45pm. Are we going straight into executive session or was there any break? Okay. So we can just stay seated and proceed to execute the session. Good evening to everybody. The January 13th session of the Albemarle County Public Schools Board is adjourned. This is Graham Page, chairman of the board. It's now officially closed because they were already gone when it started. Thank you very much.
thank you both. Our motion carries. 7-0. Thank you.  Oh, we're back. Hi everyone. Thank you. Good night. Thanks
